decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( sucr-120-2, sucr-120-3, sucr-120-4, sucr-120-5, OS map, site location plan, householder flood risk assessment, sucr-120-0, sucr-120-1, design and access statement received on the 04.04.2014. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed along the proposed walls of the extension hereby approved to the adjacent property 118 Sutton Court Road without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension & a single storey rear extension to the house.
